content:
Craft an item of type: black_concrete_powder
inventory=[{"type": "light_gray_terracotta", "quantity": 36, "index": 10}, {"type": "gravel", "quantity": 4, "index": 13}, {"type": "map", "quantity": 62, "index": 18}, {"type": "sand", "quantity": 4, "index": 19}, {"type": "ink_sac", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone", "quantity": 29, "index": 27}, {"type": "light_blue_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}]
thought: To make black concrete powder, I first need to make black dye. Black dye can be made from an ink sac, which I have in slot 21. Therefore, I will move the ink sac into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 21 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
